job.title: Software Engineer 2, Video
job.description:
Condé Nast is a global media company producing the highest quality content with a footprint of more than 1 billion consumers in 32 territories through print, digital, video and social platforms. The company’s portfolio includes many of the world’s most respected and influential media properties including Vogue, Vanity Fair, Glamour, Self, GQ, The New Yorker, Condé Nast Traveler/Traveller, Allure, AD, Bon Appétit and Wired, among others. Condé Nast Entertainment was launched in 2011 to develop film, television and premium digital video programming.


The Role

The Commercial team at Condé Nast is seeking a full-stack software engineer to be a founding member of the Commercial Video platform team. This person will help define and develop the Commercial Video platform and strategy and Conde Nast. They will work closely with other teams sharing a mission of increasing revenue and improving video ad KPIs. Your work will drive the future of Condé Nast’s Video strategy in today’s publishing market, and reach our millions of readers around the world.


Why work with us? 


  • The People. We are a growing team of engineers who are passionate about the code we write. We love to learn, and likewise want to teach and challenge each other to become better engineers.
  • The Code. We are strong believers of “the right tool for the right job.” Our main technologies include Node.js, React, GraphQL, and Git
  • The Culture. We are committed to our users and our work, but we know we work best when we are relaxed and comfortable.


About the Role


  • You will be involved with high level design and architecture decisions as well as hands-on coding to build our next generation of Commercial Video ad platform and products. 
  • Apply advertising technology domain knowledge to broaden and improve our ability to interact in the video ad tech ecosystem.
  • Translate business needs and strategy into technical specifications & requirements.
  • Direct software team members and provide hands-on contributions to architecture, systems design, implementation, testing and deployment.
  • Map out development pathways to meet current and future opportunities in the rapidly changing online and streaming video advertising space.
  • You should be someone who values code quality and delivering outcomes. As a seasoned Engineer you will be a subject matter expert in one of the following areas: distributed systems, marketplaces, frontend development, backend development or ad tech with a focus on video. While we don’t expect you to be an expert in all areas, we do expect that you have enough experience to debug production issues, lead technical designs and implement new features.


About You - Required skills/experience 


  • BA/BS or equivalent combination of education and experience
  • You’re a software engineer with 5-10 years of experience.
  • Expert knowledge of JavaScript and Node.js, good understanding of ES6, React.js and JavaScript testing frameworks (such as Jest, Mocha etc.)
  • Professional experience using source control: Git, GitHub
  • High level competency designing, implementing, and testing systems that interact using OpenRTB, VAST, VPAID, DSP, SSP for high availability ad serving and measurement.
  • Good understanding of Cloud Native architecture - Docker, AWS, CI/CD.
  • You try to make the codebase nicer for the next person that visits it.
  • You are someone who will own every step of the development process; from refining tickets to shipping the code to production.
  • You’ll do your best, and ask for help when it’s needed.
  • You can communicate through a variety of media (Slack, video, email, and in person) effectively, being able to discuss complex technical topics using clear, understandable language. 
  • Able to effectively communicate technical concepts to different audiences
  • Business proficiency in spoken and written English
  • Experience working with international teams across multiple time-zones


About you - Desirable skills/experience


  • Experience in digital advertising preferably in video advertising formats
  • Familiarity with technical aspects of programmatic digital advertising including industry standards and best practices
  • Experience working with international teams across multiple time-zones
  • Mentoring and/or management experience
  • Experience and/or interest in working with digital advertising
  • Experience and/or interest in working in publishing
  • Proficiency working with a variety of third party APIs and developer tools
  • Lead complex technical or product efforts involving many engineers
  • Provide technical guidance and mentorship to peers
  • Analyze and optimize code for quality, efficiency, and performance
